title: Love Island Australia: identical twin brothers Luke and Josh enter
text:
Things are already heating up on Love Island Australia.

But the contestants will be rocked by the introduction of identical twin brothers Luke and Josh Packham, 25.

On the teaser for Tuesday's episode, the two men are set enter the Fijian villa and are both determined to win over Cassie.

Meet the new Love Island Australia intruders! Identical twins brothers Luke and Josh (pictured) are set to stir things up in the Fijian Villa

The trailer first introduces Luke as a synthetic grass installer from Sydney's Northern Beaches and Josh as a 'dodgy mortgage broker.'

'We're full-on, a lot to handle. A lot of energy. We're definitely double trouble,' Luke admitted.

'I've definitely been told more often that I'm more attractive than Josh,' he insisted.

Battle: The two men are set enter the Fijian villa on Tuesday and are both determined to win over Cassie

After disagreeing with his brother, Josh explained that the pair are both determined to impress the girls.

'We're not going to hold back. All the boys haven't really done it for the girls so far, so it is free game,' he said.

'When we do like the same girl, it does get pretty serious. I'm going in and I have my eye on Cassie,' he added.

Buff: Luke (pictured) is introduced as a synthetic grass installer who insists he has 'been told more often that I'm more attractive than Josh'

A surprised Luke stated: 'I have my eye on Cassie too, to be honest.'

'Let the best man win,' Josh said as the pair laughed.

Love Island Australia season two continues on Channel Nine, Tuesday, 8.30pm.
description: Things are already heating up on Love Island Australia.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
